subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: J. R. Smith set a team record for 3-pointers and an N.B.A. record for 3-point attempts, but an ailing Carmelo Anthony disappeared from the offense, and the Knicks had no discernible defense.
snippet: J. R. Smith set a team record for 3-pointers and an N.B.A. record for 3-point attempts, but an ailing Carmelo Anthony disappeared from the offense, and the Knicks had no discernible defense.
